scenario_text.value: I wonder what’s in this box.
I think I heard something break.
Maybe there was some sort of pottery inside?

I’m more worried about the noise. You think
they heard?
Oh no! I hear their footsteps!
Just what I was afraid of.

We can’t stay here, we’ll get spotted! Let’s
go hide back in the other hall!

You mean we’ll have to sneak back here again?
Oh, I’m sorry!
